name: Space John - Mobile Game
description:
Help him to defeat all the enemies that cross in front of you.
You will control a spaceship.
As you progress through the game, you will have a NEW spaceship, in order to reach maximum lethal capacity.

Controls:
- TILT your phone to move the ship.
- TAP the screen to shoot.

You will have your availability 8 different levels, which you will have to defeat the Enemy Boss and only then will you be able to advance to the next level.


This game is a small game, but a bit difficult.

You may encounter one or more errors, because I am still learning to program. If you have any questions, do not have problems sending me an email.
I hope you have fun and do not forget if that is the case give me a good review and share it with your friends.
